title: About
intro: Discover more about me and learn why I decided to dedicate myself to programming.
text: My journey into programming began in high school, where I discovered a deep passion for the subject. I could spend hours coding, completely losing track of time.
text2: This initial fascination has persisted throughout my university studies and into my current full-time career path in programming.
text3: Beyond coding, I cherish spending time with my family, friends, and girlfriend. I also have a diverse set of hobbies including sports, music, video games and editing
